code: import React,{useState,useContext}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{InspectionContext}from'../contexts/InspectionContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function AssetIdentification(){const[localId,setLocalId]=useState('');const{setAssetId}=useContext(InspectionContext);const navigate=useNavigate();const start=()=>{if(!localId)return;setAssetId(localId.trim());navigate('/inspection');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"h-screen flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Asset Identification"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"border p-2 rounded mb-4 w-full max-w-sm",placeholder:"Asset ID",value:localId,onChange:e=>setLocalId(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:start,className:"bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded",children:"Start Inspection"})]});}
